howdy, y'all!

I'm Jesse. I'm a UI & Web Designer and a graduate of The Iron Yard. Jumping into UI design is a natural progression of my love of making and communication. You can read more about how I got into design here.

I was born and raised in the Deep South—Mississippi, humid summer nights, and "y'all" have a special place in my heart. I currently live in beautiful Austin, Texas with my fella and our two dogs.

This year, I'd like to improve my Illustrator and Photoshop skills, learn JavaScript, improve my Spanish, travel to at least one National Park, and learn how to play the banjo.

"I want to be around people that do things. I don't want to be around people any more that judge or talk about what people do. I want to be around people who dream, and support, and do things." —Amy Poehler
